title: WTB: large lot of raw t206 commons - poor condition okay
author: ATP

posts.post_title: WTB: large lot of raw t206 commons - poor condition okay
posts.post_content: Looking to pick up a larger sized group of T206 commons in poor to fair condition, raw.  Minimum fifty, prefer over one hundred in one shot.  If you have a group of lower grade, raw cards that you have since upgraded and want to move a bunch at once, please let me know.  Best, Jeff

Bump, picked up a nice low grade lot of 100 a few weeks ago and ready for another.  Please let me know if you have a group to sell.
Best,
Jeff

Bump, bought a couple lots, ready to buy another hundred or so.  Please email me with what you have to sell.
Best,
Jeff
Bump, looking to buy another decent sized lot of lower grade raw T206 again.  At least 50, preferably 100 plus.  Thanks.  Jeff
